description: Variation of condition 1 of planning permission dated (RN 10th January 2023 (RN 22/07918/FULL) for 'Replacement lean to infill extension with new timber frame, adjust and increase existing opening on the rear elevation, new timber frame, doors to Lower Ground Floor and Ground Floor to rear extension, new condensing unit to external front light well with acoustic enclosed Louvred door beneath proposed steel stair, replacement of existing front windows with new hardwood slimline double glazed windows, installation of photovolatic panels at roof level, new external metal stair to front lightwell, new Portland Stone to existing main entrance to the front elevation, existing steel balustrade ground Floor rear elevation extended to all terrace'. NAMELY, replacement lean to infill extension with new timber frame, adjust and increase existing opening on the rear elevation, new timber frame, doors to Lower Ground Floor and Ground Floor to rear extension, new condensing unit to external front light well with acoustic enclosed Louvred door beneath proposed steel stair, replacement of existing front windows with new hardwood slimline double glazed windows, installation of photovolatic panels at roof level, new external metal stair to front lightwell, new Portland Stone to existing main entrance to the front elevation, existing steel balustrade ground Floor rear elevation extended to all terrace.
